languages.text: "Авель — ее добрый близнец, Фантазия. Он не знал своего прошлого, как и остальные, но чувствовал больше — он всегда был иным. Потому он приблизился к Реставрации первым... одним из первых".

"Abel was her good twin, Imagination. He did not know his past, just like the others, but he felt more than they did. He was always different. That was why he was the first to get close to the Restoration... one of the first."
languages.original_text: "Авель — ее добрый близнец, Фантазия. Он не знал своего прошлого, как и остальные, но чувствовал больше — он всегда был иным. Потому он приблизился к Реставрации первым... одним из первых".

traits.locale_text: "Abel was her good twin, Imagination. He did not know his past, just like the others, but he felt more than they did. He had always been different. That was why he was the first— one of the first to get close to the Restoration."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: 「アベルは彼女のよき片割れ、想像力。他の者と同様に己の過去を知らなかったが、誰よりも過去を感じていた。いつだって、他の者とは一線を画していた。だから最初に復元になじんだ…誰よりも最初に」
languages.original_text: "Abel was her good twin, Imagination. He did not know his past, just like the others, but he felt more than they did. He was always different. That was why he was the first to get close to the Restoration... one of the first."

traits.locale_text: 「アベルは彼女のよき片割れ、想像力。他の者と同様に己の過去を知らなかったが、誰よりも過去を感じていた。いつだって、他の者とは一線を画していた。だから最初に復元になじんだ…誰よりも最初に」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: “亚伯则是她忠实的孪生兄弟，代表‘想象’。如同其他人一样，他不知道自己的过去，但他的洞察力比其他人更加敏锐。他总是与其他人格格不入，因此，他成了最早接近复原的人……或者说，那批人之一。”
languages.original_text: "Abel was her good twin, Imagination. He did not know his past, just like the others, but he felt more than they did. He was always different. That was why he was the first to get close to the Restoration... one of the first."

traits.locale_text: “亚伯则是她忠实的孪生兄弟，代表‘想象’。如同其他人一样，他不知道自己的过去，但他的洞察力比其他人更加敏锐。他总是与其他人格格不入，因此，他成了最早接近复原的人……或者说，那批人之一。”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: « Abel était son jumeau, l'imagination. Tout comme les autres, il ne savait rien de son passé, mais il a toujours été différent, plus sensible que ses comparses. C'est pour cela qu'il a été le premier à s'approcher de la Restauration... ou l'un des premiers, tout du moins. »
languages.original_text: "Abel was her good twin, Imagination. He did not know his past, just like the others, but he felt more than they did. He was always different. That was why he was the first to get close to the Restoration... one of the first."

traits.locale_text: « Abel était son jumeau, l'imagination. Tout comme les autres, il ne savait rien de son passé, mais il a toujours été différent, plus sensible que ses comparses. C'est pour cela qu'il a été le premier à s'approcher de la Restauration... ou l'un des premiers, tout du moins. »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: «Abel era su gemelo bueno, la Imaginación. Al igual que los demás, no conocía su pasado, pero era capaz de sentir más que el resto. Siempre actuaba diferente, por eso fue el primero en llevar a cabo la Restauración... Bueno, uno de los primeros».
languages.original_text: "Abel was her good twin, Imagination. He did not know his past, just like the others, but he felt more than they did. He was always different. That was why he was the first to get close to the Restoration... one of the first."

traits.locale_text: «Abel era su gemelo bueno, la Imaginación. Al igual que los demás, no conocía su pasado, pero era capaz de sentir más que el resto. Siempre actuaba diferente, por eso fue el primero en llevar a cabo la Restauración... Bueno, uno de los primeros».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Abel war ihr guter Zwilling, die Vorstellungskraft. Er kannte seine Vergangenheit nicht, genau wie die anderen, doch er spürte mehr als sie. Er war immer anders. Daher war er der Erste, der der Restoration nahekam ... einer der Ersten."
languages.original_text: "Abel was her good twin, Imagination. He did not know his past, just like the others, but he felt more than they did. He was always different. That was why he was the first to get close to the Restoration... one of the first."

traits.locale_text: "Abel war ihr guter Zwilling, die Vorstellungskraft. Er kannte seine Vergangenheit nicht, genau wie die anderen, doch er spürte mehr als sie. Er war immer anders. Daher war er der Erste, der der Restoration nahekam ... einer der Ersten."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Abel, onun iyi kalpli ikizi Hayal Gücü'ydü. Tıpkı diğerleri gibi o da geçmişinden habersiz olsa da onlardan daha fazlasını hissedebiliyordu. O her zaman farklıydı. Yeniden Yapılanma'ya ilk yaklaşan olmasının, daha doğrusu ilk yaklaşanlardan biri olmasının sebebi de bu."
languages.original_text: "Abel was her good twin, Imagination. He did not know his past, just like the others, but he felt more than they did. He was always different. That was why he was the first to get close to the Restoration... one of the first."

traits.locale_text: "Abel, onun iyi kalpli ikizi, Hayal Gücü'ydü. Tıpkı diğerleri gibi o da geçmişinden habersizdi ama diğerlerinden daha fazlasını hissedebiliyordu. O her zaman farklıydı. Yeniden Yapılanma'ya ilk yaklaşan olmasının sebebi bu. İlk yaklaşanlardan biri daha doğrusu."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
